body:
Hello everyone,

I was really wanting to interact with some people in the avicus but I don't have and don't know how to use teamspeak. If anyone could give a step by step process on what I need to do to get it and also how to use it. Also if it is simple don't call my dumb.

Thanks

title: Teamspeak

replies.body: Have you tried this link?
replies.body_tagged: Have you tried this link?

replies.body: Nope. Thanks Numberz! Also does it matter if I use 32 or 64 client bit?
replies.body_tagged: Nope. Thanks Numberz! Also does it matter if I use 32 or 64 client bit?

reply_to.body: Have you tried this link?
reply_to.body_tagged: Have you tried this link?

replies.body: You will have to figure out if your PC is 32 or 64 bit. In most cases, computers are mostly 64 bit today. This link should help. If you download and configure with the wrong one, nothing serious will happen, but just make sure you follow the steps to the site listed above.
